chapter.title: Networking (neutron) API v2.0
chapter.para: Use virtual networking services among devices that are managed by the OpenStack Compute service. The Networking (neutron) API v2.0 combines the API v1.1 functionality with some essential Internet Protocol Address Management (IPAM) functionality. Enables users to associate IP address blocks and other network configuration settings with an OpenStack Networking network. You can choose a specific IP address from the block or let OpenStack Networking choose the first available IP address.
